entry.title: Home
entry.content:
Biography

I received his B.Eng in Power and Mechanical Engineering from Wuhan University, China in 2018. Currently, I am pursuing PhD degree in Biomedical Engineering, National University of Singapore (NUS).

My main areas of interest include medical robotics, reinforcement learning, autonomous control.

Education

01/2019 – present
Ph.D in Biomedical Engineering
National University of Singapore, Singapore
CAP: 4.70/5.0

09/2014 – 06/2018
B.Eng in Mechanical Engineering
Wuhan University, China
GPA: 3.75/4.0          Ranking: 3/148

Honors & Awards

11/2021 Silver Award in EMEDIC GLOBAL 2021 (Skullbot)
11/2021 Best presentation in EMEDIC GLOBAL 2021 (Skullbot)
09/2018 Excellent Graduate Thesis of Wuhan University
05/2018 Excellent Graduate of Wuhan University

Acadamic service

Journal: 3*TASE, Journal of Robotics
Conference: ICRA2022, 2*ICRA2021, 2*IROS2021, ROBIO, 2*ICRAM
